DOC.brief_summary: This study pilot test self-help automate Website ( similar self-help book ) design help individual learn method manage mood . The method cognitive-behavioral skill find effective treatment depression provide live therapist . The purpose study determine number individual visit site , use site , respond online survey report mood level use site , 1 , 3 , 6 month start use site . The investigator want eventually examine whether learn method online would help prevent depression .
DOC.detailed_description: Self-help automate website Spanish English consist 8-lesson course mood management base cognitive behavioral method . Accessible via web . Follow-up assessment conduct 1 , 3 , 6 month .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old valid email address fluent English le 18 year age valid email address fluent English
